metadata.title: CVE-2011-1285 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The regular-expression functionality in Google Chrome before 10.0.648.127does not properly implement reentrancy, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via unknown vectors.

criterions.comment: libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'libv8 not supported').
